query: graduate business programs in New York
response_text:
**Top Graduate Business Programs in New York**

**Tier 1**

* Columbia Business School (Columbia University)
* New York University Stern School of Business (NYU Stern)
* Harvard Business School (HBS) - New York City Campus
* Cornell University Samuel Curtis Johnson Graduate School of Management
* University of Pennsylvania Wharton School (Penn Wharton) - New York City Campus

**Tier 2**

* Fordham University Gabelli School of Business
* Baruch College Zicklin School of Business (CUNY)
* City University of New York Baruch College - Marxe School of Public and International Affairs
* Long Island University - Brooklyn Campus (LIU)
* Pace University Lubin School of Business

**Tier 3**

* St. John's University - The Peter J. Tobin College of Business
* Manhattan College Dorothy and Peter Lynch School of Business
* Hofstra University Frank G. Zarb School of Business
* Iona College Hynes Institute for Entrepreneurship & Innovation
* New York Institute of Technology (NYIT)

**Other Notable Programs**

* New School for Social Research - Milano School of International Affairs, Management & Urban Policy
* The College of New Rochelle School of Business & Technology
* Stony Brook University - College of Business
* Syracuse University - Martin J. Whitman School of Management
* Rochester Institute of Technology - Saunders College of Business

**Factors to Consider**

* **Reputation:** The reputation of the program within the business world and academia.
* **Curriculum:** The quality and relevance of the coursework, as well as the availability of specializations.
* **Faculty:** The experience and expertise of the faculty, and their willingness to engage with students.
* **Career Services:** The support provided to students in finding internships and full-time employment.
* **Alumni Network:** The strength and accessibility of the alumni network.
* **Location:** The proximity to industry centers and potential career opportunities.
